Enjoy the Ultimate Way of Travel with Insight Vacations New Luxury Gold Collection Published on : Friday, October 16, 2015
Insight Vacations, the leader of premium and luxury escorted journeys is thrilled to announce its new Luxury Gold collection for its 2016-17 season. This all-new collection with its authentic Signature Experiences has over 30 outstanding itineraries in Europe, India, Bhutan, Nepal, North America and South America.
Luxury Gold is in a class of its own with guests enjoying the below:
Staying at the finest hotels that have been carefully selected for their exceptional service, comfort and style in top locations.
Dining on epicurean delights at a Michelin-star restaurants.
Exclusive VIP experiences that enable clients to go behind the scenes of the world’s most iconic attractions, events and excursions.
Travelling on a Wi-Fi equipped luxury motor coach with limousine legroom.
Receive unmatched personal service and attention from an expert Travelling Concierge.
A personal airport welcome and round-trip private transfers, luggage delivered to their room and all restaurant, hotel and guide tips covered.
“Luxury Gold is the fulfillment of a dream, the bringing together of a 100 year legacy in luxury experiences, with four generations in our family-run company giving a lifetime of service,” says John Boulding, Global CEO of Insight Vacations. “It brings true attention to detail, exceptional service, outstanding quality and above all, superb value and it is these qualities that make Luxury Gold, like our sister luxury brands Uniworld and Red Carnation Hotels, the best in the world.”
Eight new Luxury Gold European journeys showcase together an unmatched collection of once-in-a-lifetime experiences including these two highlighted itineraries:
French Elegance with Monaco Extension
This 11 or 15-day Luxury Gold journey highlights Normandy, Brittany, Paris and the Cote D’Azur and can include the Monaco extension with a four-night stay the elegant Hermitage Hotel in Monte Carlo. A Paris Signature Experience includes an opportunity to meet the choreographer at the Nouvelle Eve and then enjoy the best seats in the house for dinner and the famous cabaret show. While in Versailles, they will stay at the luxurious Trianon Palace hotel, a Waldorf Astoria property. In Deauville, guests will enjoy a Signature Dining experience at the Michelin starred Le Dauphin restaurant where chef, Mathieu LeGuillois serves classic French cuisine and stay at the luxury seaside resort property, the Royal Barriere. They will also have an unforgettable Signature Hotel stay at the Domaine de Beauvois, a 17th century chateau in the Loire Valley featuring gourmet dining and spa.
Ultimate Italy
This 12-day Luxury Gold itinerary showcases the iconic destinations of Rome, Capri, Perugia, Florence, Cinque Terre and Venice. In the ultimate VIP Signature Experience, clients enter the Sistine Chapel for a private tour with a Local Expert before it opens to the public. The fast-tracked entry into the Vatican Museums ensures maximum enjoyment of the priceless Papal art collection. On the island of Capri they will ride an open-top taxi to the 5-star luxury boutique Signature Hotel, the Capri Palace and enjoy a Signature Dining lunch at Il Riccio – a Michelin-starred restaurant famous for its incredible food and stunning waterside setting. In Florence, guests enjoy an exclusive VIP visit to the Vasari Corridor, a one kilometre long passageway between the Uffizi Gallery and the Pitti Palace.
